Job Title: Fund Manager,  DAY TRADE OUR COMPANY MONEY, Part-Time At Home We Train
Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post



TRADE FUND MANAGER
Work Part-Time.  At Home.  We Train Online.  Trade Our Money Online.

We are a WORK-FROM-HOME company and our day traders did GREAT in 2020!  We are ready to do even better in 2021 with more TRADE-FROM-HOME Fund Managers.  We are getting a fast start by releasing new funded accounts this week to independent contract Trade Fund Managers.

Trade Fund Managers train online to trade online.  They trade our Company Money, trading from home, 1 or so hours a day, 4 or so days a week.

We have all learned over the last weeks and months that we need a backup (or primary) income created from home. The time to get that second backup or primary home based income flowing is before you need it.  We need Trade Fund Managers so apply with us now.  Our 20+ year day trading system and trading our Company money creates an ideal home-generated secondary and even primary income.  We invite you to study this ad.

For years men and women across the country, and the world, have day traded our Company money.  They have sought big extra cash, a lifestyle income, and increased savings and wealth they need and desire day trading our 20+ year system and Company money.  Many have even retired early or more securely.  With our proprietary indicators we even signal you when a trade is ready to take.  Our funded accounts are rare and come available only as we create new accounts.  Our day traders just don‚Äôt give them up.  Our Trade Fund Managers report they are living the way they wanted and doing things financially they never thought possible, and now a reality day trading with us.  Starting part-time, many retire early or more security from their typical jobs and continue a day trading retirement with us working just part-time while still enjoying a lifestyle income and increasing their savings and wealth.

We do this as experience over the years has taught us that men and women day trading part-time at home are more comfortable and make better trades.  Today‚Äôs technology and our techniques makes it all possible.  With our 20+ year system, home day traders do better than so called ‚Äúprofessionals‚Äù working all day in the office, being clever with trades, getting tired, and making too many mistakes.  With online Trade Fund Managers, not only is the Company account growing at the greatest rate, but the account is at less risk by being diversified over more people and talent.  By this approach, men and women can earn a great home-based part-time income and we enjoy a greater resulting outcome.  It is a big win ‚Äì win!

Click Here For Details - www.TradeCompanyMoney.com/CLJL1

POSITION
Summary ‚Äì This is a Trade Fund Manager position where you can trade up to $100,000 of our Company money and keep up to 80% of your trade earnings. Train online from home or your office. Day trade online from your home or office.  Most of our fund managers trade just minutes to 1 or so hours a day.  That seems to be enough for them, but you can day trade more to earn more.  Trade any time the market is open.  That is 24 hours a day from Sunday 5 pm Eastern to Friday 5 pm Eastern so it fits with busy schedules.  You are not an employee, as we moved away from that model years ago.  We are looking for independent minded and self-starter people who essentially want to run their own trade account.  You can also use the system to trade your own money as well keeping 100% of your earnings, which many of our Trade Fund Managers do, often from their profits trading our Company money.

Specifics:
WE TRAIN YOU ‚Äì We are committed to your success with extensive 1-to-1 online live personalized training and other online and onsite training formats.  Remember you can trade our money, so we are committed to your training.
WE FUND YOU ‚Äì Part of your education is to trade our Company‚Äôs real money account.  Begin with a starter account and with positive account growth we can quickly add up to a full trade fund of $100,000 of our Company real money.  You can earn all along the way and with a larger trade fund you can earn more without having to trade more.
WE SHOW YOU ‚Äì We have 2 daily online trade webinars to show and train how to find and place real market trades.  Our Trade Fund Managers may see the same trade potential and choose to take these same trades.
WE SIGNAL YOU ‚Äì Use our 20+ year trade secrets and proprietary trade signals that are simple to use and highly predictive.
WE SUPPORT YOU ‚Äì we provide 1-to-1 live personal support.  Call us, text us, email, chat with us, and join in our webinars, seminars, etc.  We are hear to help you trade profitably.
YOU TRADE ‚Äì Simply trade from home or anywhere, a few minutes to 1 or so hours a day, 3 or 4 days a week when the market is open.  That seems to be enough for many of our Trade Fund Managers, but you can trade more to earn more if you choose or trade less if your lifestyle or schedule dictates such.
YOU PROFIT ‚Äì You keep up to 80% of your profits day trading our money.  If you choose to trade any of your profits or other private funds you will keep up to 100% of your earnings.  You traded your money.


REQUIREMENTS
Summary ‚Äì We ask you to trade a minimum of 3 or 4 days a week and place a couple of trades on those days.  Again, you can trade more days and take more trades each day, if you wish to earn more.

Specifics:
TRADE ‚Äì Just trade 3 or 4 days a week and place 1, 2, or more trades on those days, of course if the trades are properly signaled.  Again, you can trade as much as you want to earn more.  You can trade any time you wish, any day you wish, and for as much or as little as you wish.
COMPUTER ‚Äì Use your own home or office computer.  A Windows or Mac operating system is fine.  A simple laptop or desktop is fine.  Having a mouse with your computer is best.
INTERNET ‚Äì Internet connectivity is needed as you will train and trade online.
TEACHABLE ‚Äì You must be willing to learn and follow a system of day trading shown successful for years among thousands we have trained.  Our system is based on principles so you can easily adapt it to what is comfortable to you.
TRADE DEMO TRIAL ‚Äì You will need to complete a Trade Demo Trial to see if day trading our 20+ year system is agreeable with you.  For most the Trade Demo Trial is completed in 10 days to 2 weeks.  The Trade Demo Trial takes just days and with self-initiated signup it is just $10
TRAINING ‚Äì The Trade Demo Trial provides an experience and familiarization.  You will need certifying training to gain the initial skills needed to enter the market successfully and to access your Company funded account. We have a lot of interest, so we ask candidates to share in the cost of training with a reasonable Certifying Training tuition.  Many new Trade Fund Managers simply choose to finance their tuition so it does not come out of their personal budget.  Many of our Trade Fund Manager seek to use their earnings to pay any monthly finance fees and ultimately pay off their tuition.  As such, the tuition never really comes from their personal budget. 
APPOINTMENTS ‚Äì Most of our training is 1-to-1 so we can best ensure your understanding and success.  These appointments will be based upon your scheduled and availability.  We simply need you to keep your online appointments or notify us in advanced.  After training you can day trade anytime and any where you wish.  If you ever need help, just contact us.

Click Here For Details - www.TradeCompanyMoney.com/CLJL1

FIT
Summary ‚Äì We are committed to your success, as you will be trading our Company money.  As such, our systems and training are exceptional and personal as we need you to be exceptionally and personally successful.  We know the importance of support for your success so all of our support is live and personal.  We have an upbeat and helpful community and we are looking for people that fit well within a teachable, helpful, and yet success based culture.

Specifics:
DRIVEN ‚Äì We are looking for independent, self-starting, money oriented, and success minded people. You will not be an employee but an independent contractor.  We do not have time to micro-manage you.  You will need to keep your initial training appointments and then have the initiative to trade your funded account for your own benefit.  If you are motivated towards success, you can do great and we will be fine.  Its win ‚Äì win.
MONEY MINDED ‚Äì Some people are uncomfortable around money and how to achieve a proper relationship with it.  If you are uncomfortable around money, talking about money, making money, having money, looking for what life can provide with money, looking at the good that can be done and shared with money, etc. then this is not for you.  We can make money and need people comfortable and balanced around money on our team.
BALANCED ‚Äì Simply fit into our culture of balance around driven monetary success, have  an outlook around the good big money can accomplish, and stay in the space of teachable as well as helpful to other traders.  That‚Äôs it!


STEPS
Summary - Day trading may not be for everyone, so we want you to get the initial information you need, try a Trade Demo Trial, and we can go from there.  More specifics follow.

Specifics:
DETAILS - Follow the links for more details and to decide if the Trade Demo Trial is right for you.
TRADE DEMO TRIAL - We will help you with 1-to-1 Trade Demo Trial coaching.  Signup online and there is just a small $10 fee for the 30 day trial.  You can be trading the live market in about a week with a practice account, winning trades and seeing the earnings potential day trading our system.  With our help, the Demo Trial takes about 7 ‚Äì 10 days to know it works for you.
DECIDE - The trial does not teach mastery, but provides you an experience day trading.  You will be able to answer three important questions with the Trade Demo Trial.  (1) Does this 20+ year system work for you with winning trades and seeing its earnings potential?  (2) Are we a company and group of people you can associate with?  (3) Is this the answer to the needs and wants you have?
GET TRAINED - Again, the Demo Trial just gives you awareness of our system.  You will need proper training before trading real money in the market.  You will be trained by active day traders trained and certified as coaches with the Company.  As stated earlier there is a reasonable tuition for Certifying Training that we share with you.  Details are listed at the website.
GET FUNDED -  During training get a real money starter account, so you can begin making money.  You can request more Company trade funding to be added to your Company trade account each 30 days or 90 days your account is positive, based on your level of training.  The more money you have in your trade account, the more money you can make while simply doing the same type and amount of trading.
TRADE - Continuing trading for the results you seek in big extra cash, a lifestyle income, early or more secure retirement, etc. while growing your savings and wealth.  Grow an income into the lifestyle you want and do good for those around you.

Click Here For Details - www.TradeCompanyMoney.com/CLJL1

It is exhilarating to be on a winning team, especially when winning brings success to others.

Image having the lifestyle income you need and want day trading from home just minutes to an hour or so a day.  Imagine having the money to pay down all the bills, updating the cars, making all the needed repairs and updates to your home or buy the home you really want, start buying and doing the things you need and desire, as well as helping the people around you, and more.

Imagine even retiring early or more securely by day trading our system. You do not have to wait to save for retirement, simply earn it along the way.  Get started and let us train you and then add more and more money to your account as you have positive trade results.  The more money in your account, simply the more money you can earn, with no more time or effort.  Just continue to day trade through retirement and you can enjoy ever increasing profits.  With day trading our system and Company money, create and maintain your lifestyle income while at the same time having increasingly extra income to build your savings, accumulate wealth, and lock in financial security in retirement along the way.  It can be your reality, much like many of our Trade fund Managers.  We have been doing this for years and we know how to help so you can achieve a day trading needs and wants.

It is very clear to all of us that it is now imperative to have an independent secondary, replacement, retirement, or wealth generating income that you control.  Fortunately, it appears things are improving with the COVID-19 issue, the stock market, etc.  Now is the time to put in place an independent income, because we have all experienced that more personal, community, etc. calamities will simply keep occurring.  Having an independent income not connected to a single employer or business, the local or regional economy, etc. is now critical.

See the reality of this for yourself by trying our Trade Demo Trial for a few days.  We will help you with real and live online personalized help.  You can see that this lifestyle is also not that far away and fits into any demanding schedule.  You can experience that it can be done in only minutes to an hour or so a day while trading from the comfort and safety of your home.

We invite and welcome your inquiry.

TWENTY 4 SEVEN EXPRESS INC. is looking for CDL Class A Over the road Driver.

Twenty 4 Seven Express is a smaller outfit focused on bringing the best miles for our drivers. The key to success both as a driver and company is to keep moving without down time and without sitting around waiting for loads. We offer pre-plans from our dispatch team, this way you are always pre booked ahead to know where you are moving next. Our company is dedicated to make sure you make what you deserve and keep you busy if you are away from home and your family. Our drivers make anywhere from $1800-$2200 weekly. The miles for the week (7 day work week) are 3000+ Miles so you will need to be able to handle these miles on week to week basis. We pride ourselves to be a company that always pays you on time and gives you the earnings that you deserve to be out over the road.  If you are hard working and get under paid don't miss out a great opportunity to work for a great outfit and start making $100K+ annually.

Here are the Requirements for this position:

- 3 year experience is a must with a CLASS-A CDL
- Driver has to have or get Hazmat/Tanker Endorsements within 1 month of employment.
- This Position is for a Reefer or Dry Van Trailer
- Driver has to be able to handle 3000+ miles a week.
- Minimum of 2 week stay out time is required.
- No Recent Log Book Violations
- No out of service violations for log books for the past year.

Job Description

- 48 state hauling
- ONLY ONE TRUCK AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME
- 55c a mile start pay (WITH HAZMAT) If you don't have HAZMAT you will start at .55c a mile however you need to be willing to get the Hazmat within the first month of employment (we will cover your hazmat endorsement fees)
- Pay Day Every Friday with direct deposit.
- 3000+ miles a week. (All our drivers avg around 3300-3600 miles per week)
- Keep Trucking ELD with Tablet.
- Unlimited DATA on Tablet.
- Pre-Plans for loads (Never sit around waiting for loads we always pre plan so you are moving all the time)
- 1099 Pay (we don't hold anything back)
- $100 Mileage Bonus for the month (1st Place for Miles in the Company within the month)
- $100 Good Inspection Bonus (level 1, level 2, or level 3) (immediate pay) You can get as many inspections as you wish its $100 every time you get a good inspection.
- Driver has to have a Smart Phone
- Driver has to have a working e mail on his phone or we can provide an e mail for you with the Tablet


Job available right away and will be given to first person that applies with clean background and clean MVR. We need to talk before you are sent a Application since you will need to be cleared by our Insurance Company to get hired on.

CALL OR E MAIL US TODAY

Job Title: Foreign Currency Trader - Finance, Part Time, Work From Home - Remote
Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


Top-ranked proprietary trading firm, Maverick Trading, is searching for entrepreneurially-minded, profit-driven people to be trained in the art and science of proprietary trading in its online foreign exchange trading division, Maverick FX.  Successful candidates will trade foreign currencies with the firm's capital on behalf of the firm and reap the majority share of the profits.

As one of the best proprietary Forex trading firms in the industry, Maverick FX offers its traders impressive capital and leverage, comprehensive training, and extensive support and mentoring.  We teach our traders how to trade in the Forex market.  Maverick FX's capital base, training, and reputation has allowed us to partner with the top currency trading broker to offer our traders tighter spreads and better execution than the typical retail Forex firm.

The Forex market is open 23-1/2 hours a day, five days a week.  This time horizon allows the firm to offer its traders flexible hours and the ability to start part-time and transition into full-time trading.  Prop forex trading is a mentally engaging, challenging profession where diligence and consistency translate directly into financial reward.  In other words, this is truly meaningful work.  The firm's traders have the opportunity to practice their craft from anywhere in the world via high-speed internet.

---About Maverick Trading FX Division---

Started in 1997, Maverick Trading is one of the most experienced prop trading firms and is ranked as one of the top trading companies in the industry, accepting and funding experienced traders as well as teaching motivated people from all backgrounds how to become traders.  The firm's Maverick FX Division has been actively trading the Forex markets since 2009.  As a result of a long track record of success, the firm has the capital to back and fund its traders with meaningful amounts of capital.

Each trader starts live trading with a minimum of a $10,000 account ($500,000 in buying power) and keeps 70% to 80% of trading profits.  As you gain experience and demonstrate consistent profitability you become eligible for greater amounts of the firm's capital.  Our top traders can trade up to $300,000 ($15 million in buying power).  Profitable traders are also eligible for Performance Bonuses.

---How to Apply---

Our application process is multi-step and designed to educate you on prop trading, how we train, support and fund our traders, and how we pay out profits to you, as well as focus you for your interview where you can have any remaining questions answered and discuss with your recruiter why Maverick FX is a good fit for you.
To get started, click on the application link below.  This will take you to a short video that will discuss Maverick FX and its Capital Sharing Program (how you get funded and paid).

When you complete the application process, you will be contacted by one of our experienced recruiters (who are also traders themselves) for a Suitability Interview.

CLICK on the link below to begin the application process:

https://maverickfx.com/maverick-trading/apply/fx-division/?utm_source=clfxhouston


If you're interested in trading the markets at a professional level, whether part-time, full-time, or in a transitional or supplementary income capacity, it pays to start with one of the best prop trading firms in the industry.  

We look forward to speaking with you and exploring if you'll be the next great trader to join us.

Cheers,

The Maverick FX Team

Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


First and foremost, thank you for your interest in Dish Society. Things in the restaurant industry have dramatically changed over the last few months, and we‚Äôre looking for the right people who can join our team during an unpredictable and rapidly evolving time.

We want you to know that the safety of our team members and guests is, and always will be, our number one priority. We know times are tough right now and we want you to have the utmost confidence that you will be safe and protected in our restaurants. Please reference our website for a list of all of the actions we‚Äôre taking to keep our team and guests safe: https://www.dishsociety.com/covid19/ .

Dedicated to using the highest quality and freshest ingredients possible, Dish Society sources a majority of its products locally. The all-day restaurant turns out a seasonally changing menu with healthful modern twists on traditional favorites for breakfast, lunch, supper, and brunch. Since launching in 2014, Dish Society has opened five locations (Galleria area, Memorial, Downtown, Heights, and Katy), and will open its sixth location later this year in West University/Bellaire. Because of this extraordinary growth, we need an army of exceptional people who can deliver exceptional experiences for their fellow team members and our guests. 

*HOTTEST 4O FAST CASUAL RESTAURANT CONCEPTS IN THE COUNTRY - QSR Magazine
*BEST RESTAURANT IN THE GALLERIA AREA - Houston Press
*TOP 25 RESTAURANTS OF HOUSTON - Houston Press
*50 FINEST RESTAURANTS IN HOUSTON - Houston Modern Luxury Magazine
*BEST BRUNCHES IN HOUSTON - Houstonia Magazine
*BEST BREAKFASTS IN HOUSTON - Houstonia Magazine
*TOP 5 HEALTHIEST RESTAURANTS IN HOUSTON - Houston Modern Luxury Magazine

The accolades above are great, but what we're most proud of is our people and the culture we're creating. We're growing quickly and provide legitimate career opportunities with incredible benefits that promote a work life balance. 

check out our video to see what it's like working at Dish Society: https://youtu.be/PwCL5HVRJlY 

The bottom line is that badass restaurants need badass people. That's where you come in. If you NEED a job, we're NOT interested. We're looking for someone who WANTS to be a part of our team. This is a true career opportunity, not just a job. This is your chance to get in on the ground floor of a HOT concept and create something extraordinary with us. 

Now, about you - are you:
-- Naturally driven to provide exceptional service? 
-- Interested in sustainable food, local economies, and giving back to the community? 
-- Team-oriented with a great attitude and work ethic? 
-- Driven, entrepreneurial, creative, and passionate? 
-- Hungry? (For success. . .and, well, food?) 

If you answered yes, or "like a boss," to these questions, then you sound like our guy or gal. 

If you're ready to embark on a wild adventure with the best team in Houston, we want to hear from you. Please follow the instructions below and tell us about yourself both personally and professionally. We believe in a work-life balance, so whether you are a connoisseur of Kung Fu movies or you refurbish mid-century furniture on the weekends, we want to hear about it. 

So you in or what? 

Eff yeah, I'm in! How do I apply???

Please click on the link below to complete the job application.
APPLY HERE: https://workforcenow.adp.com/mascsr/default/mdf/recruitment/recruitment.html?cid=e4c4250e-c436-4a7c-a14d-f721b19c65dd&ccId=19000101_000001&lang=en_US

Look forward to hearing from you!

Job Title: O/O Take Home $2400 AFTER FUEL - Free Tag, Trailer, NO DEDUCTIONS!
Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


Owner Operators Only ‚Äì No Company Trucks to Compete with!


FREEDOM EXPRESS ‚Äì *DRYVAN* OPERATIONS

We are a Florida based Dryvan Carrier with a large and active NATIONAL customer base that allows us to offer Both REGIONAL and FULL OTR lanes to the States YOU specify, and with a Home-Time schedule that YOU determine.

You will not find a more driver friendly company to work with, than Freedom Express Jacksonville, a Dryvan Division of the US 1 and Freedom 1 Networks.


FREEDOM EXPRESS OFFERS THE FOLLOWING:

‚Ä¢ FREE TAG!! (we will register and plate your truck with a 48 State Apportioned IRP tag at NO COST to you, and we will renew it for you every year. FREE)!!

‚Ä¢ FREE TRAILER!! ‚Äì No Fees or Deductions for this, they are simply FREE! (Plus: we rotate our equipment out to keep them in top condition. The oldest trailer in our fleet is about 1 year old ‚Äì and many of them are brand new)!

‚Ä¢ ZERO DEDUCTION PROGRAM - All Mandatory Deductions (including OccAcc and NTL Insurances, plus your ELD fees), they are all waived. FREE!!

‚Ä¢ PAY PER MILE PROGRAM - ALL DISPATCHED MILES PAID ‚Äì LOADED AND EMPTY ‚Äì You will never have to worry about unpaid deadheads, we pay by the mile, and we pay ALL miles, loaded or empty.

‚Ä¢ BIG FUEL SAVINGS ‚Äì VERY BIG! We have a Fuel Discount program that is one of the best in the industry, our fleet is currently enjoying discounts ranging from $0.35 to $0.55 or more below marquee posted prices. These are HUGE discounts!



YOU HAVE CHOICES:

1. You tell us that States or Regions you want to run.

2. You choose your Return Date - (Every time you roll out, your dispatcher will ask you when you want to be back home)!

3. You specify how many miles you want to average per week, and we will load-plan you accordingly!





QUALIFICATIONS:

We are a 100% Owner Operator Based carrier, so you must have your own Truck. Truck needs to be 20 years old or newer.

Drivers must be at least (25) years of age and have at least (2) years of CDL Tractor-Trailer experience within the last 5 years (12 months experience must be within past 36 months), no felonies within the last 10 years, and no convictions for possession, sale or use of any illegal drugs (misdemeanor or felony), ever. Of course, a respectable MVR and PSP score will also be required. (Pre-Qualification typically only takes a couple of hours).


Onboarding can be completed in as little as 3 to 4 days ‚Äì Start to Finish!


READY TO DISCUSS IT WITH THE OPERATIONS TEAM?

During Normal Business Hours, (8am to 4pm, M-F):
Call our Dispatch Team at 904-930-4344.

Outside of Normal Business Hours:
You can Submit an official QUICK APP. (Well, it is more of a questionnaire than it is an application).
‚Ä¶It will take you less than 5 mins to complete, and you can do it from your PHONE Right Now!
We‚Äôll then contact you during normal business hours to follow up and answer any and all of your questions!

To proceed with the QUICK APP, please follow this link to the Online Questionnaire, powered by DriverOnboarding.com, our official onboarding specialists!

http://www.driveronboarding.com/questionnaire.html

Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


Alleyton Resource is seeking a qualified Aggregate Field Service Technician (Mechanic). This position will reside in the Eagle Lake, Texas area.

Job purpose

The position of Aggregate Field Service Technician (Mechanic) will be instrumental in the repair and maintenance of all front end loaders, skid steer, forklift, and cranes while maintaining a safety first attitude. Some knowledge of commercial truck repair is a plus. This position requires management resources in adherence with all company standards, policies and procedures, as well as compliance with all federal and state regulations, including OSHA, TCEQ etc. 

Duties and responsibilities

‚Ä¢	Will analyze malfunctions of all company equipment and perform repairs, rebuilds and maintenance of all equipment.
‚Ä¢	Dismantle and reassembles equipment, using hoist and hand tools.  
‚Ä¢	Examines parts for damage and excessive wear, using micrometers and gauges.
‚Ä¢	Replaces defective engines and subassemblies, such as transmissions, hydraulic cylinders, etc.
‚Ä¢	Welds broken parts and structural members.
‚Ä¢	Tests overhauled equipment to ensure operating efficiency.
‚Ä¢	Servicing equipment as necessary.
‚Ä¢	Other duties as assigned.

Qualifications

To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skills, and/or ability required.  Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disability to perform the essential functions.

Education and/or Experience:
High school diploma or general education degree (GED) preferred. Minimum two years of related experience and/or a combination of both. Thorough knowledge of construction, diesel, and other related heavy vehicles and equipment. CDL is preferred by not required.
Computer Skills: Experience with Microsoft Office products and some ability to adapt to other computer software. 

Working Conditions

Consists of both office setting and on-site at plants. Office environment will include suitable work areas and standard office equipment. On site work consists of activities which include navigating heights, machinery and exposure to elements such as dust, changes in temperature and weather. Required safety equipment will be issued and policies and procedures focused on safety will apply.

Physical/Mental Requirements

While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk and hear. This position requires standing, walking, bending, kneeling, stooping, crouching, crawling and climbing at times. The employee must frequently lift or move items up to 10 pounds and occasionally lift or move items up to 75 pounds. Must be able to frequently climb stairs and ladders. May occasionally deal with heights. Must be able to safely maintain 3 points of contact when applicable. Excellent interpersonal skills; ability to establish and maintain effective relationships with staff, employees and managers. Effective conflict resolution abilities. Ability to present facts and recommendations effectively in oral and written form. Ability to read, write and do mathematics.

Other Requirements

EEO/AA Employer/Vet/Disabled Statement

Alleyton Resource Company provides equal employment opportunity to all individuals regardless of their race, color, creed, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by state, federal, or local law

Background on Alleyton Resource Company 
Alleyton Resource is an integrated aggregates and ready mix concrete company based in the Houston, Texas area. Alleyton operates over 20 sand and gravel sites and over 10 ready mix concrete locations in the west Houston metropolitan area. Alleyton currently employs approximately 550 people.  

Alleyton Resource is part of Summit Materials. Summit Materials was formed to acquire and grow heavy-side building materials companies in the aggregates, ready-mix concrete, cement, asphalt paving, and construction industries
Other Job Attributes:
compensation: DOE

employment type: full-time

Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


OCCUPANCY SPECIALIST
Seeking experienced applicants for the position of Occupancy Specialist in Midtown area of Houston, TX for 192 units in affordable housing. The successful candidate will have experience processing applications to qualify prospects for low income tax credit housing (LIHTC) and HOME units. This position reviews, certifies applications and fills vacancies for public and locally owned housing; coordinates and solicits information from various internal and external departments to process applicants; and updates and maintains daily, monthly and annual reports of occupancy from information obtained from applicants and various other sources. 
MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS REQUIRED: Experience with LIHTC program is a must. Two years of customer service experience is preferred. This position is a compliance position, and requires someone with strong organizational skills. Candidate must have very strong customer service skills working with a diverse population. Detailed oriented is a must. Excellent oral and written communication skills are required, as well as advanced math skills. Proficient in Microsoft Office preferred. 
BASIC FUNCTIONS / RESPONSIBILITIES
. 
1. Fosters a positive, active and collaborative relationship with residents, communities and associated agencies 
2. Interacts directly with prospective and current residents to achieve maximum occupancy
3. Preserves and respects resident and applicant confidentiality 
4. Provides instruction and guidance to prospective residents during application process 
5. Coordinates leasing to include intakes, interviews, processing and preparation of applications, and their distribution.
6. Prepares lease packages and supplemental documents for new move-ins and annual re-certifications 
7. Coordinates and maintains a waiting list
8. Responsible for answering the phones and returning voicemails 
9. Responsible for updating the interest list on a daily basis
10. Meets the needs of The Property Manager & Director of Compliance when related to The Department
11. Reviews resident files to ensure Program Compliance is being met.
12. Is a team player and can multi-task based on priority of assignment
13. Performs administrative duties for the department when needed.
14. Gathers corrections at the time of a file review and physical inspection has findings
15. Ensures Property Rent rolls are always accurate. 
16. Prepares reports when requested from the Monitoring Agencies, Investors, Owners, accurately and within the deadline.
17. Attends employee meetings and training seminars as requested.
18. Performs other duties as assigned by the Director of Compliance when requested.
Other Job Attributes:
compensation: $15 starting

employment type: full-time

Job Title: Hunter or Veteran - Unique Outdoor Job
Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


Offering a unique position that involves the abatement/removal of birds, including by legal lethal means when necessary. Prefer a hunter and/ or former military that is trained and experienced with the SAFE use of firearms. MUST be able to pass a thorough background check - no felony arrests (no exceptions) and be able to pass initial and random drug and alcohol screening. Recreational alcohol / 420 outside of work hours are acceptable. 
Must be willing to work outdoors and in adverse conditions.

 ~FIRM days and times for work are:
Monday thru Friday from 12:30pm - 6:00pm, AND Saturdays from 6:30am - 4:30pm (minus 30-minute lunch), for a total of about 37 hours per week. Off every Sunday. This is a full time, permanent position with benefits. Must be reliable for these days and times. Please do not apply if you cannot adhere to these days and times every week reliably. 

Serious inquiries only please. Be prepared to answer a few questions by phone or email prior to setting an interview. $13.50 per hour, full time, benefits including medical, dental, vacation, and 401k available after 90 days. On-site ATVs, firearms, training, and all supplies provided. 
~Experience and confidence shooting firearms safely is required~

We are looking to hire immediately. Applicants will interview this Wednesday or Thursday and will start Thursday or Friday. Please bring valid driver's license with you to the interview.

$100 starting bonus will be paid upon completion of your first 2 weeks.  This is a great steady job, but you must be RELIABLE and SAFE.

Check qualifications - Please do not apply unless you fit ALL of these criteria:
1) U.S. Citizen, fluent in English speaking, reading, writing, valid driver's license, 21+ years of age.
2) No felony arrests. National background check will be done.
3) Professional or personal experience safely loading & shooting firearms.
4) OK with rugged, outdoor environment.
5) Schedule: Monday thru Friday from 12:30pm - 6:00pm, AND Saturdays from 6:30am - 4:30pm
6) Must be able to walk briskly and lift 50lbs. No history of mental illness or PTSD.
7) Must pass hair follicle drug test - After hours recreational 420 is ok.

 Email brief resume -OR- a brief description of yourself and recent or relevant work history, firearm history, etc, and a phone number where you can be reached. Thank you
Other Job Attributes:
compensation: 13.50/hr + bonus & benefits

employment type: full-time

Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


Used Car Sales Manager (Bilingual) 
Our dealership Is currently looking for an experienced sales manager that has a proven record of proficient sales leadership in BHPH accounts. 
We are a fast-growing dealership even in this pandemic situation that is hurting many of our competitors. We presently have great momentum and want to continue growing our dealership with strong leaders. This is a great opportunity for any sales manager that looking to work directly with the owner and receive great compensation for providing above-average results.
Candidate must be multitasking ready all the time, work with a sales team in order to increase sales revenue, have good closing skills, good computer skill, have knowledge of Auto Action, and Carketa  (programs we use to manage our data. 

Job Description

The Sales Manager ensures that the dealership meets its unit sales quotas and its gross objectives on a daily, monthly, and yearly basis. S/he will ensure that the retail and fleet units sold produce sufficient gross to aid the dealership in reaching its profit objective on a monthly and yearly basis. S/he will accomplish these objectives through planning, organizing, coordinating, and measuring the activities of our Vehicle Sales Departments.
Duties and Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢	Make a monthly projection of the vehicle requirements by department for the immediate 90-day sales period.
‚Ä¢	Determine monthly and yearly forecasts in terms of unit sales, gross profit objectives, and departmental profits.
‚Ä¢	Forecast monthly with each salesperson to establish objectives in terms of the number and type of customers coming into the dealership, closing percentages in each category, time utilization, prospecting efforts, unit sales, and projected income.
‚Ä¢	Recommend to the Dealer procedures for short-and long-range advertising, sales.
promotions, staffing needs, lease promotions, compensation plans, customer complaints, salespersons‚Äô evaluations.
‚Ä¢	Prepare a Plan of the Week and submit it to the Dealer.
‚Ä¢	Meet with each salesperson as early as possible every day to review yesterday‚Äôs results and today‚Äôs plan of action.
‚Ä¢	Conduct sales meetings.
‚Ä¢	Facilitate pre-delivery with the Service Manager.
‚Ä¢	Provide on the job training for salespeople.
‚Ä¢	Ensure that salespeople are following an established prospecting program to obtain
optimum results.
‚Ä¢	Review monthly commission sheets, productivity reports, salespersons‚Äô monthly forecast, and profit performance with the Dealer by salesperson and as a department.
‚Ä¢	Maintain a balanced vehicle inventory and establish a program for moving used cars in inventory over 45 days.
‚Ä¢	Require that standards be maintained for displaying, merchandising, and maintaining vehicles.
‚Ä¢	Ensure that every prospect is thanked personally.
‚Ä¢	Check the condition of all demonstrators monthly.

Immediate opening for Pet Care Staff at Pawtown in Spring, TX. We have one position available for full time.  40+ hour work week. Hours will vary and include an 8 or 9 hour shift between 7am and 7pm or 8am to 2pm on Saturday and Sunday.  Most holidays and weekends required. Duties will include feeding, kennel and potty yard cleaning, potty walks, dog bathing, dog day care supervision as well as receptionist and reservation booking duties. Looking for someone who is going to stay for the long-term and be an integral part of our team! You must have a strong work ethic, character, ability to multitask, and spend a good amount of time on your feet, part of which will be outside in the heat or cold during day camp. Experience beneficial but will train. Computer and phone savvy is a plus. Must have reliable transportation.  Qualified candidates only apply in person from 8am to 2pm Saturday and Sunday or 8am to 4pm Monday through Friday at 2447 FM 2920, Spring, TX 77388.

Varied shift between 7am and 7pm Monday to Friday and/or 8am to 2pm on Saturday and Sunday.  Holidays and weekends required. The right candidate will have open availability. We work 365 days a year.

Starting salary is $9 to $11 per hour depending on experience and employment history.
Qualified candidates only apply in person from 8am to 2pm Saturday and Sunday or 8am to 4pm Monday through Friday at 2447 FM 2920, Spring, TX 77388.

GREAT PAY/BENEFITS, FINANCIALLY SECURE AND FAMILY OWNED COMPANY WHERE EVERYONE GETS TO KNOW YOU--NOT YOUR TRUCK NUMBER



WE OFFER 100% paid for the Employee

Health Insurance

Year around class A professional driver needed.  We are looking for an individual over the age of 25 with at least 18 months verifiable experience with a clean MVR. No current drug/alcohol violations or felonies.  Mountain and chaining experience are required.  

We are Quality Logistics, LLC.

Work for a debt-free established company in continual operation for 62 years.

We get asked "what's the catch" all the time? There is no catch. Our customer base demands the best service and pays for this service, so we need the best drivers and we pay for the best drivers.

We are expanding and looking for drivers that want a permanent home.
Are you looking to be treated with respect?
Not wanting to work for a huge company where you call in with a number instead of a name?
THERE IS A REASON WHY OUR DRIVER TURN OVER IS SO LOW.
If this interests you, please read on...

A little about us first.
We are a family owned business that was founded in 1959 and we are looking for drivers that want to join our trucking family. We are financially stable; you will not have to worry about your paycheck bouncing. You will talk to a knowledgeable dispatcher on a daily basis that knows who you are down to your favorite football team. If you have any suggestions, we would love to hear about them. In short, we care what you have to say.

Normal runs are out 7 to10 days with most, but not all, resets at home.
Our typical runs are west of the Mississippi with our focus on the Western 11 states.
Assigned trucks, NO SLIP SEATING.
Tractors are I-Shift (you will not have to shift a truck again)



Additional Benefits:

401K plan with company match from day one
Paid on all stops
Cell Phone paid stipend
Birthday gift and Christmas Gift
Vacation and quarterly bonuses
Trucks governed at 70MPH

We will be honest with you and not promise the world to get you hired then change what we promised. We have plenty of work for motivated individuals.





303-761-3195 ext 323

TWO TYPES OF POSITION TO MAKE SERIOUS MONEY WORKING FOR HOUSTON'S INDISPUTABLE #1 LUXURY MAGAZINE AND MULTI-MEDIA COMPANY, WITH "0" COMPETITION IN THE MARKETPLACE.

APPOINTMENT SETTER
WORK FROM HOME SETTING UP APPOINTMENTS

JOB DESCRIPTION:
This is NOT a sales position. You are only required to make business appointments after making a simple and friendly telephone presentation.  Someone else will visit your appointment and close the transaction in person, and you will get paid a base salary PLUS a handsome commission on every sale, PLUS bonuses.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:
1- Experience setting up appointments.
2- PC, tablet, or laptop with internet access.
3- Friendly, polite, and professional attitude.
4- Impeccable telephone etiquette, capable of dealing at senior management level.
5- Organized and capable of writing reports.
6- Available Monday through Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
7- Must live in the Houston metropolitan area to understand this market, and attend Covid-19-SAFE training sessions and company meetings when required.
8- Inside and/or outside sales experience a plus.
9- Bilingual is always a bonus.

WHAT WE OFFER:
1- The opportunity to work for one of Houston's top luxury magazines, from the comfort and convenience of your home. No gas, clothing, or outside lunch expenses.
2- Base salary, starting at $1,050/month ($250 per week) for the first 30 days.  Raises after showing results.
3- Commissions starting at 15% per appointment that converts into a sale (usually starting at $1,125 per sale).
4- Handsome Bonuses when reaching weekly and monthly goals.
5- Realistic potential to close at least two deals per week, securing a minimum weekly income of $2,500.

HOW TO APPLY: Email your Personal R√©sum√© at careers@luxcior.com.


TOP PRODUCERS (INSIDE/OUTSIDE SALES) for TWO products:

1- LUXCIOR: Houston's only Hispanic Bilingual Luxury Lifestyle Magazine (www.LUXCIOR.com).
2- 2021 HOUSTON EXOTIC AUTO FESTIVAL - Houston's ultimate show of private exotic automobiles, luxury dealerships, high-end aftermarket, and premier non-automotive brands.

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:
EXPERIENCED SALES EXECUTIVES 
- Experienced, professional, results-oriented, aggressive Top Producers with a proven track-record in Inside/Outside Sales.
- Experience in dealing with senior executives at high-end local and national businesses.
- Outstanding personal presentation; must dress to impress.
- Polished social skills and pleasant personality.
- Top communication skills. Ability to write professional proposals.
- Must be willing to work on a full-time basis (sorry, this is NOT a part-time opportunity).
- Immediate availability.


WHAT WE OFFER:
The right candidates will be offered the unique opportunity to work for the unquestionably top luxury lifestyle magazine in Houston, developing a career in a professional, fun, and rewarding environment, with a handsome compensation package (loaded with perks), that includes:
- $1,200/monthly base.
- Commissions up to 20%.
- Generous Weekly and Campaign Bonuses.

APPOINTMENT SETTER
WORK FROM HOME SETTING UP APPOINTMENTS

This is NOT a sales position. You are only required to make business appointments after making a simple and friendly telephone presentation. 4- Impeccable telephone etiquette, capable of dealing at senior management level.
5- Organized and capable of writing reports.
6- Available Monday through Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
7- Must live in the Houston metropolitan area to understand this market, and attend Covid-19-SAFE training sessions and company meetings when required.
8- Inside and/or outside sales experience a plus.
9- Bilingual is always a bonus.

WHAT WE OFFER:
1- The opportunity to work for one of Houston's top luxury magazines, from the comfort and convenience of your home. No gas, clothing, or outside lunch expenses.

3- Commissions starting at 15% per appointment that converts into a sale (usually starting at $1,125 per sale).
4- Handsome Bonuses when reaching weekly and monthly goals.

- Experience in dealing with senior executives at high-end local and national businesses.
- Outstanding personal presentation; must dress to impress.
- Polished social skills and pleasant personality.
- Top communication skills. Ability to write professional proposals.
- Must be willing to work on a full-time basis (sorry, this is NOT a part-time opportunity).

WHAT WE OFFER:
The right candidates will be offered the unique opportunity to work for the unquestionably top luxury lifestyle magazine in Houston, developing a career in a professional, fun, and rewarding environment, with a handsome compensation package (loaded with perks), that includes:
- $1,200/monthly base.

- Plenty of perks.

Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


We all know times are tough. There is record unemployment. Our government is shutting down industries and more people are expected to be out of work soon. Many people dream of opening their own business. Everyone thinks they can be successful if someone would just give them a chance, give them the training they need, and get them the capital they need to get started.

We offer a Business Literacy program created by the FDIC and promoted by the SBA. This 2 to 4 week  business literacy program helps anyone who completes the 13 module SBA/FDIC study program borrow $50,000 to $250,000 (depending on their needs) to start their very own business. We can get them started regardless of their background or credit history.

If you are an independent life insurance agent looking to partner with a professional organization we have the perfect program for you. We don‚Äôt require that you be captive. We don‚Äôt require that you pay us to get started. We don‚Äôt care what state you‚Äôre located in.

A few requirements however:
** Currently licensed and working full-time as a life insurance or annuity agent for no less than three years.
** Organized ‚Äì we won‚Äôt teach you how to stay on top of things.
** Competitive ‚Äì with your previous self and others.
** A Player to the core ‚Äì you despise the status quo and love to grow.
** Continually moving forward.
** A bit OCD ‚Äì not ‚ÄúLaid-back‚Äù
** Able to make a decision and self-manage
** Enjoy group settings and be able to generate and continue conversation.

1)      You must feel a burning desire to get up EVERY day and earn a great living. You can earn up to $500,000 a year but you should be wanting to earn more, much more.

2)      You must attend training workshops via Zoom t before you are contracted.

3)      You must attend a weekly training workshop via Zoom to continue to be contracted.

You earn a commission on the loan generated, (one percent = $500 to $2500 per student) the life insurance policy used to guarantee their loan ($1500 to $2800 per student- if licensed) ‚Ä¶ and more (other products and services that earns you ($500 to $1200 per student)... and the students never pay a penny out of pocket and their sponsoring organization never pays a penny out of pocket.

Nearly all churches, Civic Organizations, Religious Organization and Special Interest groups will supply you with lists of individuals wanting to start their own business or you can arrange classes in their facilities with up to 20 attendees.  One in-house class could be worth as much as $52,000 each to the instructor/agent. We do not charge the student or the organization a fee to attend our classes. Not a dime out of pocket.

The 13 modules can be completed in a two-day class or spread out over 2 to 4 weeks online. These attendees currently do not qualify to open a business through their bank but they have a burning desire to own their own business. We get them qualified and place them through our own banks to guarantee acceptance. Nearly 100% of attendees will apply for assistance.

To find out how much more, simply contact us.
Other Job Attributes:
compensation: Great Commission

employment type: full-time

Do you have a life insurance license? If yes,  are you making less than 100% compensation? If yes, I encourage you to watch our short video below and lets schedule a 15 minute to talk, this time can be a life changer, as it was for me. 

If you are not licensed agent, no worries I was not 8 month ago either, and found a way to make $20,000+ per month! Here is how.

8 month ago I was in a total different type industry for many years and doing well. However,  due to covid-19 my income in April to now became $0, so I started to search for an income replacement.

In April I started studying for my life license, In May I passed my exam -yeah!  The company I was with at the time was all about selling policies to your friends and family plus the compensation was very low. I barely made $900 for a month or very hard work! 

In July I heard about a company FFL that started you at 90% compensation and went as high as 145% 

I also heard they were lead generated, no more selling to friends and family! They sell to people requesting our services!! YEAH that was music to my ears. 

So in July I joined FFL, I went through a week of free training (watch lots of videos on youtube of agents making $25,000+ per month)

In July I made over $9000 income with Family First Life (FFL) and in August over $15,000, I‚Äôm very happy and now making over $20,000 a month.

So why do I post this.. good question. 

I‚Äôm thankful for the opportunity FFL gave me and just wanting to share my story with everyone looking for a career change like me or if you are in life insurance business not making what you‚Äôre worth come join us at FFL.

- Our compensation starts at 90% and goes to 145%

We are seeking an Operations Manager to become an integral part of our team! You will coordinate and oversee the organization's daily operations.

Job Responsibilities Include, but are not limited to:

‚Ä¢ Build strong collaborative teams of support staff to ensure service is of the highest standards ‚Äì capable of representing Pivotal Protection as the premier provider of security services in the industry

‚Ä¢ Plan, budget, and track results of responsible branch office(s) to ensure strong financial performance and complete customer satisfaction

‚Ä¢ Review activities, costs, operations and forecast data to determine branch progress towards stated goals and objectives

‚Ä¢ Achieve year-over-year growth in profit percentage and dollars in the branch

‚Ä¢ Confer with Regional Vice President to review achievements and discuss required changes in goals or objectives resulting from current status and conditions

‚Ä¢ Provide guidance and support to ensure branch maintains a consistent focus on strong customer relationships and higher customer retention

‚Ä¢ Ensure 100% compliance with all federal, state and local regulations

‚Ä¢ Ensure 100% compliance with all contracts and collective bargaining agreements

‚Ä¢ Lead career-pathing and succession planning programs within the branch

‚Ä¢ Support employment cases and union activities as needed

‚Ä¢ Ensure progressive discipline is followed on all corrective actions

‚Ä¢ Supervise and manage all branch staff

‚Ä¢ Identify prospects and develop sales strategies from start to finish securing new business

‚Ä¢ Analyze local & expansion markets to identify sales opportunities, prospective companies, and associated buyers

‚Ä¢ Develop pricing and business development strategies

‚Ä¢ Prepare proposals, RFP responses, and sales presentations

‚Ä¢ Work with local management and Regional Vice Presidents to plan, conduct, and follow up on sales opportunities

‚Ä¢ Follow-up on referrals and self-generated leads to identify buyer influences and any timing issues; prepare reports on the status of leads and other reports as required

‚Ä¢ Plan and organize activities that build our brand in assigned market

‚Ä¢ Negotiate terms of sales, contract wording, the timing of implementation, etc.

‚ÄãQualifications:

‚Ä¢ Contract security experience managing multiple clients and accounts is preferred

‚Ä¢ Experience as a field operations manager or scheduling experience is a plus

‚Ä¢ National Account Experience preferred

‚Ä¢ Reliable transportation

‚Ä¢ Ability to be a self-starter and commitment to excellence!

‚Ä¢ On-call availability required.

‚Ä¢ Must be very autonomous

‚Ä¢ A college degree in business or related field is preferred

‚Ä¢ Minimum 2-year management experience; 3 years preferred

‚Ä¢ Pass an extensive screening process

Job Title: Make $60,000+ and Get PAID to Learn
Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


Paid CDL Training
We'll pay you while you get your CDL. Training to obtain your CDL is part of the job.  Once you have your CDL, you'll continue getting paid on the job training with a Certified Driver Trainer (between 2-3 weeks). From there, Roehl drivers are making $60,000 or more a year. After you have your CDL, you'll start your on-the-job training as a long haul truck driver.
You'll be paid $500, when you work a full week, as you get your CDL in our three-week CDL training program located at our local terminal.  You are hired and paid as an employee on day 1.  
No one invests in you like Roehl. 
If you were to go to a CDL school, you would not get paid while you are training AND you'd have to come up with the tuition for the school.  We're a stable company that provides full benefits - we invest in you.
Because the demand for this popular program is so strong, the first step is to complete our Get Started form on Roehl.Jobs  
https://roehlrefer.me/gycdl-cl-ad
If you contact Roehl by email, please include your first name, last name, email address, phone number, zip code and if you already have Class A CDL in your message so we can connect with you. You can also provide this information on our website.
CALL Sherrie  715-591-7050
We're open and hiring during COVID-19.
As professional drivers carry our country through these uncertain times, it's more important than ever that we support our driving teammates with the resources and amenities they need. Roehl's locations across the country are open for our driving teammates, and we're hiring (and training) essential workers who want to join TeamRoehl.
You will then move through a learning and application process, where we ensure that you have a good understanding of the program, the basic qualifications and the characteristics of a truck driving job with Roehl so you can complete a thoughtful and informed application.
Premium Benefits
Roehl offers a complete benefits package to truck drivers, including one of the top profit-sharing contributions among US trucking companies, to support drivers and their families. In a truck driving job with Roehl, you'll find our benefits both comprehensive and affordable. Learn more about our pay, benefits and why so many experienced truck drivers choose Roehl. 
Career Path Opportunities
Want to advance your career? Whether you're an experienced driver, an owner operator or just starting out in the industry, with Roehl you'll find a wide variety of options both inside and out of the truck. Dedicated fleets offer many unique schedule, pay and freight options. In certain areas, local truck driving positions are regularly available for drivers with six months experience. You can also become a Certified Driver Trainer. From owning your own business to becoming an instructor - including non-driving positions  - your career path with Roehl is filled with options. 
About Roehl Transport and our Truck Driving Jobs
Roehl Transport provides professional truck driving jobs for those who are looking for a long-lasting career with a forward-thinking, driver-oriented company that is built on values. Our truck driver jobs include all levels of experience, as well as flatbed/specialized, van, refrigerated, and curtainside cargo.
‚Ä¢         Experienced Company Truck Drivers
‚Ä¢         Owner Operators
‚Ä¢         New Drivers CDL School Graduates
‚Ä¢         Learn to Drive a Truck (We will pay you while you get your CDL)
Roehl also provides career opportunities for non-drivers. Roehl is one of the 100 largest trucking companies in the nation. Our customers include some of the most prestigious brand names in America.
When you join Roehl you'll be part of a hands-on family business with people that are passionate about delivering the goods that drive America - we're giving trucking a new name.
Roehl Transport
Our drivers are leaders. 
Our leader is a driver.

QR Code Link to This Post


WE WANT YOU! Roadmaster Drivers School, a Premier National Commercial Truck Driver Training School and a subsidiary of Werner Enterprises, Inc., is seeking an experienced and proven manager to provide strong leadership in training the next generation of safe and professional commercial truck drivers at our upcoming Houston, TX campus!

We offer:

‚Ä¢ Full-Time Position
‚Ä¢ Competitive Salary Paid Bi-Weekly ($60,000 - $75,000 based on experience)
‚Ä¢ Health Insurance, Dental Insurance & Vision Insurance
‚Ä¢ Company provided Life and AD&D Insurance
‚Ä¢ Various other Insurance Benefits available
‚Ä¢ Paid Vacation and Sick Time
‚Ä¢ 401(k) Retirement Plan w/ Company Match
‚Ä¢ Employee Stock Purchase Program w/ Company Match
‚Ä¢ Employee Perks Program through Abenity¬Æ
‚Ä¢ Opportunities for Advancement

Job Description:

As the Associate School Manager, you will be directly responsible for the overall administration, coordination and management of the school site operations in various areas as assigned. Areas of responsibility include management of training functions at the school while providing assistance and input to the admissions, administration, student finance, and placement functions of the school. You will be responsible to adhere to operational directives and assist in meeting projections and performance goals. You will work closely with corporate senior management to achieve objectives and grow the location based on network needs. Additional responsibilities include, but are not limited to:
‚Ä¢ Working closely with senior management to maximize school efficiency through adhering to policy and procedures in order to produce well-managed training operation
‚Ä¢ Direct management of CDL Instructors and Training Supervisors on a daily basis
‚Ä¢ Working closely with the admissions department to maximize student enrollments and enroll qualified students for training
‚Ä¢ Working closely with the placement department to ensure qualified students achieve the best possible employment opportunities
‚Ä¢ Assisting in preparation for school inspections by local, state and Federal agencies under the direction of the corporate compliance department
‚Ä¢ Conducting weekly student orientations and monitoring and managing student progress, student attendance, and student retention
‚Ä¢ Responsible for ensuring associates adhere to applicable policies and procedures
‚Ä¢ Assistance and involvement in the hiring, coaching and counseling of school personnel as applicable
‚Ä¢ Responsible for complete, correct and timely submission of all evaluations, forms and required reports associated with school operations and additional reporting as requested
‚Ä¢ Must be able to travel as needed for initial and continuing training purposes and support of other school locations as needed

Qualifications:

‚Ä¢ 3-4 years of managerial and supervisory experience, preferably in the private school industry or transportation industry or a bachelor's degree in Business Administration and minimum 1-2 years of management experience
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge and understanding of management with a focus on excellent customer service through leadership
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and presentation skills
‚Ä¢ Able to travel for initial and subsequent training and to provide support for locations as needed
‚Ä¢ Possess strong leadership ability to perform the duties of managing, coordinating and directing school operations with a particular focus on training and administration, with daily support to other functional areas of school operations
‚Ä¢ Ability to assist with the implementation and enforcement of established policies and procedures, and compliance with applicable federal, state and local regulations

Please Apply Here: https://werner.wd1.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/Roadmaster/job/Roadmaster-Houston/Associate-School-Manager_JR10309-1

Additional Information:

Job Title: CURRENCY TRADERS NEEDED TO TRADE OUR MONEY- Part-Time or Full Time
Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


¬†Part-Time or Full Time - We Train (Online from Home)
Work part-time or full time from home trading our corporate funds.¬†
Train Online - Trade Online.
Our Company trade account is BOOMING, and we continue to release new funded accounts to independent contract Fund Managers.
Fund Managers train online to trade online. They trade our Company funds, trading from home 1 or 2 hours a day, 3 to 5 days a week.
Many people are recognizing the importance of having the ability to earn money from home.¬†
The time to get that home-based income flowing is before you need it.¬†
We need Fund Managers now. Our 20+ year proprietary system trading our Company money creates an ideal home-based income.
For over 10 years people have used our system and traded our Company money to create extra income and grow their savings and wealth.¬†
Starting part-time, many of our Fund Managers can create an extra income stream from home. Some even retire early or more securely and continue trading with us working just a few hours a week, while still enjoying a lifestyle income and increasing their savings and wealth.
Our experience over the years has taught us that men and women trading part-time at home are more relaxed and comfortable and make better trades. Today‚Äôs technology combined with our highly accurate trading system make it all possible. With our 20+ year proven system, home day traders do better than so called ‚Äúprofessionals‚Äù working all day in an office.¬†
With online Fund Managers, not only are the Company funds growing at a high rate, but the money is at less risk by being diversified over many people and talent.¬†
With this approach, men and women can earn a great home-based, part-time income and we enjoy a higher return on our funds. It‚Äôs truly a win‚Äìwin!
¬†
Click here for details
¬†
POSITION
This is a Fund Manager position where you can trade up to $100,000 of our Company money and keep up to 80% of your trade earnings. TRAIN online from home or your office‚Ä¶and then TRADE online. Most of our fund managers trade just 1 or 2 hours a day. That seems to be enough for them, but you can trade more to earn more. Trade any time the market is open‚Äì 24 hours a day from Sunday 5 pm Eastern to Friday 5 pm Eastern; so, it fits with busy schedules.¬†
As a Fund Manager, you are not an employee trading your time for money. Instead, we provide you with the ability to leverage our training and capital to create something much greater.
We are looking for independent minded, self-starters who essentially want to run their own trade account. You can use the system to trade your own money as well, keeping 100% of your earnings. Many of our Fund Managers do this with their profits from trading the Company funded account.
WE TRAIN YOU¬†
We are committed to your success with extensive 1-on-1 online live personalized training and other online and onsite training formats. Remember you will be trading our money, so we are committed to your training and success.
WE FUND YOU¬†
Part of your education is to trade our Company‚Äôs real money account. You‚Äôll begin with a starter account and quickly grow into a full fund manager trading up to $100,000 of our Company funds.¬†
WE SHOW YOU¬†
Our coaches host 2 daily online trade webinars to show and train how to find and place high-probability trades. Our Fund Managers often see the same trade potential as our coaches and choose to take these same trades.
WE SIGNAL YOU¬†
Using our 20+ year trade system and proprietary trade signals, gives our Fund Managers an edge in the markets.
WE SUPPORT YOU¬†
We provide 1-on-1 live personal support. Call us, text us, email, chat with us, and join in our webinars, seminars, etc.
YOU TRADE¬†
Trade from home or anywhere with a computer and internet connection. You can trade a few minutes to 1 or 2 hours a day, 3 to 5 days a week when the market is open, and it fits with your schedule.
YOU PROFIT¬†
You keep up to 80% of your profits day trading our money. If you choose to trade any of your profits or other private funds you will keep up to 100% of your earnings.
REQUIREMENTS
We ask you to trade a minimum of 3 or 4 days a week and place a couple of trades on those days. Again, you can trade more days and take more trades each day if you wish to earn more.
COMPUTER¬†
Use your own home or office computer. A Windows or Mac operating system will do.¬†
INTERNET¬† 
Internet connectivity is needed as you will train and trade online.
BE TEACHABLE¬†
You must be willing to learn and follow a system of trading proven successful for years among thousands we have trained. Our system is based on principles you can easily adapt to what is comfortable to you.
DEMO TRADING TRIAL¬†
You will need to complete a Demo Trading Trial to see if trading our system is a good fit for you. For most the Demo Trading Trial is completed in 10 days to 2 weeks. The Demo Trading Trial provides you with our proprietary trading software, basic training, access to live trading webinars, and it‚Äôs a lot of fun. You‚Äôll be able to register for just $10 so you can determine if trading with us is right for you.
TRAINING¬†
The Demo Trading Trial provides you with experience and familiarization with our system. Following the trial, you will need certifying training to gain the skills needed to trade successfully in the market and to access your Company Funded Account.¬†
We have extremely high demand for our training, so we ask candidates to share in the cost of training with a reasonable Certifying Training tuition. Many new Fund Managers simply choose to finance their tuition, so it does not come out of their personal budget. Many of our Fund Managers seek to use their earnings to pay any monthly finance fees and ultimately pay off their tuition.
APPOINTMENTS¬†
Most of our training takes place 1-on-1 so we can best ensure your understanding and success. These appointments will be based upon your scheduled and availability. We simply need you to keep your online appointments or notify us in advanced if you cannot attend. After training you can day trade anytime and anywhere you wish. If you ever need help, just contact us.
¬†
Click here for details
¬†
We are committed to your success, as you will be trading our Company money. We know the importance of support for your success, so all our support is live and personal. We have a helpful community of traders and we are looking for people that fit well within a teachable, helpful, and success-based culture.
DRIVEN¬†
We are looking for independent, self-starting, success-minded people. You will not be an employee but an independent contractor. We do not have time to micro-manage you. You will need to keep your training appointments, attend webinars, and take demo trades in order to continue in our program. If you are motivated towards success, this could be a life-changing opportunity.
MONEY-MINDED¬†
If you are uncomfortable around money, talking about money, making money, having money, looking for what life can provide with money, looking at the good that can be done and shared with money, etc. then this is not for you. Our goal is to make money and we need people who are comfortable and balanced around money on our team.
STEPS
Day trading may not be for everyone, so we want you to experience it and get some basic training by trying our Demo Trading Trial. After the trial, you will be able to determine if trading our trading system and trading our company money is a good fit for you.
¬†
Click here for more details and to decide if the Demo Trading Trial is right for you.
¬†
DEMO TRADING TRIAL¬†
We will help you with 1-on-1 Demo Trading Trial coaching. Signup online and there is just a small $10 fee for the 30-day trial. You can be trading the live market in a few days with a practice account, winning trades and seeing the earning potential trading our system. With our help, it takes about 10‚Äì14 days for most people to determine if trading with us is right for them.
The trial does not teach mastery but provides you an experience day trading. You will be able to answer three important questions with the Demo Trading Trial‚Äì
1. Does this system work for you with winning trades and seeing its earnings potential?¬†
2. Is trading something you enjoy?
3. Are we a company and group of people you want to associate with?¬†
GET TRAINED¬†

Equivity is looking for a part-time virtual paralegal with recent experience supporting attorneys in litigation law firms, with additional experience in employment law and bankruptcy. If you have at least three years of litigation paralegal experience, have previously assisted attorneys virtually for at least one year, take pride in your work, pay meticulous attention to the details, and are looking for a long-term, part-time virtual paralegal role, we want to hear from you!

The ideal candidate will have at least three years of litigation experience and will have worked in a law firm within the last six months. The selected candidate will be very technologically adept and have excellent Word, Excel, and Adobe skills. In addition, the candidate should have experience working with cloud-based practice management software, such as Clio or MyCase. The ideal candidate will also have at least two years of experience with employment and bankruptcy cases. Additional experience in other areas of litigation would be a definite plus. Experience with e-Discovery would also be preferred.

More about our company:
Equivity matches clients with virtual assistants that provide long-term paralegal, administrative and marketing support. Our virtual paralegals work with a high degree of autonomy and are responsible for developing lasting relationships with our clients. Because we provide extremely attentive service to our clients, you must be available to respond to client communications throughout the business day (Monday through Friday, 9am ‚Äì 6pm Eastern or Pacific Time) within one hour by email, phone, and text. You should also be available to complete tasks and work on projects during the business day. All of this work is done remotely, meaning that you can work from home.

The selected candidate would be hired as a part-time employee (W2) of Equivity, not an independent contractor (1099). We are looking for somebody who has at least 20 hours per week of availability, and the starting pay is $18.50 per hour. We are a growing business and are looking for a virtual paralegal who is excited to partner with us and is interested in a long-term role with our company.

Position requirements:
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree
‚Ä¢ 3+ years of recent experience (within the last six months) supporting attorneys in litigation
‚Ä¢ 2+ years of recent experience in employment law (preferred)
‚Ä¢ 2+ years of recent experience with bankruptcy cases (preferred)
‚Ä¢ 1+ year working in a completely virtual role
‚Ä¢ Excellent writing and proofreading skills
‚Ä¢ Expert proficiency with utilizing all programs within Microsoft Office, including Outlook, Word, and Excel
‚Ä¢ Advanced proficiency with Google Calendar, Google Docs, and Google Sheets
‚Ä¢ Experience editing, bookmarking, and indexing PDFs
‚Ä¢ Experience using cloud-based practice management software, preferably Clio or MyCase
‚Ä¢ Availability to respond to requests within an hour during the hours of 9 AM - 6 PM, Monday ‚Äì Friday (in Eastern or Pacific Time Zone)
‚Ä¢ Your own laptop and smart phone with broadband access to Internet
‚Ä¢ Quiet location in which to take phone calls
‚Ä¢ Experience with e-Discovery (preferred)

Qualities we are looking for:
‚Ä¢ Organization
‚Ä¢ Dedication
‚Ä¢ Initiative
‚Ä¢ Reliability
‚Ä¢ Attention to detail
‚Ä¢ Resourcefulness
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills
‚Ä¢ Responsiveness
‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently with limited oversight
‚Ä¢ Self-starter

We are currently hiring full-time Fire Alarm Technicians that meet the requirements below:

-State FAL (Required)
-Organized self-starter, able to work unsupervised and W/O a helper 
-Must be able to install complete or additions to FA systems to including all field wiring, trim devices, program, & test unassisted working from plans and equipment list only.
-Able to plan work to meet schedules and equipment needs
-Neat clean cut appearance (working in occupied buildings)
-Flexible working hrs (some work prior to 7am some after 6pm) normal hrs 7 -- 3:30 - W/mandatory 30 minute lunch, overtime as needed
-Excellent communication skills (verbal & written), ability to communicate with Property Managers, building engineers, GC superintendents, other trades & office staff
-Current knowledge of Texas rules & regulations, local code requirements & working knowledge of NFPA 72 related to Fire Alarm
-PC knowledge ability to program FA systems, data retention (FCI certified preferred)
-Excellent Attendance & Punctuality is Mandatory
-No fear of GPS tracking
-Able to pass drug screen and background check
-Have a smart phone with Internet access to clock in and out

The desired candidate will have the ability to lead associates in the installation of low voltage systems in commercial applications.  Work conditions range from commercial construction sites to finished occupied buildings.  Candidate will be required and responsible to lead others in the proper installation of various low voltage systems.  Primary low voltage system installation will include fire alarm and detection systems. Secondary systems will include intrusion security, access door control systems, CCTV systems, audio paging systems/large intercom systems.   Candidates not experienced with the secondary systems are offered both field and formal training. This training is available for the candidate interested in expanding their abilities within the low voltage industry for the additional secondary systems.
Position usually offers and requires overtime to meet customer requirements.
Candidates unable to obtain a Texas Private Security Alarm License will not be considered. Typical criteria to obtain a Security Alarm License requires no Felony convictions, or recent misdemeanor convictions. 
Candidates must hold a valid Texas Drivers License.No DUI or DWI within the past 10 years.
Benefits include holiday & vacation pay as well as 401(K). 
Health, Vision, Dental, and Life insurance is offered at 60 days.


If you have the skills that we're looking for please forward your resume via email. Please note in the subject line if you have a current FAL.
