Global Quality Imports Inc. is one of the nation's leading distributors of fine wines, spirits, beers, and other non-alcoholic products is currently seeking for an Account Receivable Clerk  Position in Houston Texas.
Global Quality Imports Inc. services the Texas wholesale beverage market with headquarters in Houston. We are located at 1230 Kress Street Houston, Texas 77020 ( globalqualityimports.com ). Our vision is recognized by our customers and suppliers as the superior distributor of alcoholic beverages in all regions where we conduct business.
If you are committed to working for a company that offers challenge, competitive compensation, great benefits, opportunity for advancement, and also appreciates diversity, is socially responsible and is regarded as one of the industry leader, Global Quality Imports is the place for you.
All resume must be submitted via email to rmurdock@attglobal.net or fax 
to 713-675-7773. No phone calls please.

Accounts Receivable Clerk
Summary:
Records payments to supplier's accounts and maintains accounts receivable records.
Essential Responsibilities and Duties:
*	Responsible for the set up and maintenance of customer supplier
*	Applies and posts customer remittances to open accounts receivable.
*	Collect and maintain invoices.
*	Track transfer records for State audits.
*	Maintain supplier bill back accounts.
*	Researches and resolves account claims and discrepancies with suppliers.
*	Answers phone inquiries and follows up.
*	Obtains and mails invoice copies for suppliers, as requested.
*	Perform other duties as assigned by management.
Competencies
To perform the job successful, an individual should demonstrate the following competencies:
*	Analytical: Synthesizes complex or diverse information; Collects and researches data; Uses intuition and experience to complement data.
*	Design : Generates creative solutions; Demonstrates attention to detail
*	Problem Solving: Identifies and resolves problems in a timely manner; Gathers and analyzes information skillfully; Develops alternative solutions.
*	Project Management: Coordinates projects; Completes projects on time and on budget.
*	Technical skills: Assesses own strengths and weaknesses; Pursues training and development opportunities; Strives to continuously build knowledge and skills; Shares expertise with others.
*	Customer Service: Manages difficult or emotional customer situations; Responds promptly to customer needs; Responds to requests for service and assistance; Meets commitments.
*	Interpersonal Skills: Focuses on solving conflict, not blaming; Maintains confidentiality; Remains open to others ideas and tries new things.
*	Oral Communication: Speaks clearly and informatively; Edits work for spelling and grammar; Presents numerical data effectively; Able to read and interpret written information.
*	Teamwork: Exhibits objectivity and openness to others views.
*	Ethics: Treat people with respect; Keeps commitments; inspires the trust of others; Works with integrity and ethically; Upholds organizational values.
*	Organizational Support: Follows policies and procedures; Completes administrative tasks correctly and on time; supports organizations goals and values.
*	Judgment: Displays willingness to make decisions; Exhibits sound and accurate judgment; Includes appropriate people in decision-making process.
*	Professionalism: Approaches others in a tactful manner; Reacts well under pressure; Treats others with respect and consideration regardless of their status or position; Accepts responsibility for own actions; Follows through on Commitments.
*	Quality: Demonstrates accuracy and thoroughness; Monitors own work to ensure quality.
*	Quantity: Completes work in timely manner; Works quickly.
*	Adaptability : Adapts to changes in the work environment; Manages competing demands; Changes approach or method to best fit the situation; Able to deal with frequent change, delays or unexpected events.
*	Attendance/Punctuality: Is consistently at work on time; Ensures work responsibilities are covered when absent.
*	Dependability: Follows instructions, responds to management direction; Takes responsibility for own actions; Keeps commitments.
*	Initiative: Asks for and offers help when needed.
*	Innovation: Generates suggestions for improving work.

Qualifications
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

Education and/or Experience
One year of certificate from college or technical school; or three to six months related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience. Previous accounting related experience preferred.

Education and/or Experience
High school diploma or general education degree (GED); or one to three months related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.

Computer Skills
To perform this job successfully, an individual should have knowledge of Internet, Excel, Word and order processing systems.

Language Skills
Ability to read and interpret documents such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, and procedure manuals. Ability to write routine reports and correspondence and to speak effectively before groups of customers or employees of organization.

Mathematical Skills
Ability to add, subtract, multiply and divide in all units of measure, using whole numbers, common fractions and decimals. Ability to compute rate, ratio and percent and to draw and interpret bar graphs.

Reasoning Ability
Ability to solve practical problems and deal with a variety of concrete variables in situations where only limited standardization exists. Ability to interpret a variety of instructions furnished in written, oral, diagram or schedule form.

Other Qualifications
*	Ability to work overtime.
*	10-key by touch

Physical Demands
The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to sit; use hands to finger, handle or feel; reach with hands and arms and talk or hear. The employee is frequently required to stoop, kneel, crouch or crawl. The employee is occasionally required to stand; walk and climb or balance. Specific vision abilities required by this job include ability to adjust focus.

Job Title: At Home Telesales ‚òéÔ∏è BEAUTIFUL COMMISSIONS üìû Everything's Provided
Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


THIS IS A WORK FROM HOME POSITION WHERE YOU'LL COLD CALL REAL ESTATE AGENTS WITH OUR ADVANCED INTERNET-BASED DIALING SYSTEM TO OFFER THEM A FREE 7 TRIAL OF OUR SERVICE... IT'S A VERY EASY SALE!

WHO IS PRESS LIKE?
Press Like is the number one platform helping modern real estate agents succeed on social media without having to do any of the work themselves. Even though some businesses are struggling through these tough times, interest rates just hit record lows, and the real estate industry across America is booming! Based on a recent study done by the National Association of Realtors, 74% of home buyers and sellers will look up Realtors social media presence before calling them to do business. So it is no longer a choice for them to have a unique social media presence to separate themselves from their competition; they need one! We are currently the industry leader trusted by the largest real estate brokerages on the planet. At Press Like, we may have a start-up vibe, but this is not our first rodeo. We've been in this space for eight years and serviced thousands of clients, and we are growing daily!

NOW HIRING
1099 work from home phone sales consultants to support our outstanding growth in the US market. Full-time sales positions will bring in on average $900-$1,900 per week. Part-time sales positions will make less depending on the hours that you put in. If you show promise, learn the structure, produce consistent sales, show leadership qualities, you could be put on a fast track to management and be trained how to help newer people get off to a great start. That is also a very lucrative position. The management team works around the clock to help with your success. You will have the opportunity to call Realtors Monday through Friday during their business hours. We have daily Zoom meetings on the weekdays where we roleplay with each other and share sales techniques to get better every day. There is a beautiful bonus structure, daily jackpots, along with weekly and monthly bonuses that reward consistency to ensure that you will always make a great living while growing along the way.

WHAT TO EXPECT
We have lots of training videos and scripts for you to go over before you start. There is live in-call coaching with lots of virtual meetings and role-playing to improve yourself daily. You log onto our system with a good internet connection and a headset with a microphone. Within 1 minute of logging in, a real estate agent with all of their information will connect to your headset. You read through the perfect script word for word, add your personality to be yourself, and build a tremendous human connection throughout the call. If you get stuck, don't worry, we are listening and will talk you through where to navigate and what to say, and the clients won't be able to hear us. If you want help on a call, and you are not sure if anyone is listening, then you use the walkie-talkie feature that everyone downloads on their phone, so we are just a push of the button away!

WHY SHOULD YOU JOIN OUR TEAM?
‚úì Great company with a service that real estate agents must have!
‚úì Endless income potential!
‚úì Weekly pay period!
‚úì No contract, commitment, or upfront cost for our clients to get started... Easy Sale! 
‚úì Stability - Almost every new person from last week made at least one sale on their first full day!
‚úì Flexibility - Work a full-time schedule in any time zone across the US! 
‚úì Training - You'll have the actual scripts that have brought us millions of dollars in sales! 
‚úì On-going daily development!
‚úì Access to six-figure top producers who are happy to help!
‚úì State of the art software!
‚úì Easy calling system with leads built-in!
‚úì The product dominates what our competition provides hands down!

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR
‚Ä¢ One year of experience in direct sales, preferably over the phone! 
‚Ä¢ Someone not timid to ask for the sale with class and respect... Then ask again!
‚Ä¢ Highly motivated positive thinker, with a strong work ethic!
‚Ä¢ Success is an obligation!
‚Ä¢ Great phone presence with a pleasant vocal tonality!
‚Ä¢ Willing to implement a proven system with an open mind!
‚Ä¢ Can read a sales script perfectly like a paid actor or actress while thinking off the cuff!
‚Ä¢ Confident personality!

HOW TO APPLY:
2. Email us your resume.
3. Check for our email reply letting you know if you are invited to the interview.
4. If invited, join the Zoom meeting interview at 5:00 PM PST with the ID # we give you and possibly start as soon as Monday.

The seats are limited to how many people we can assist at once, so your resume submission timing will affect your opportunity to get started. Please take a look at our website http://www.presslike.com to see examples of the service we provide and watch a video of us in the Portland Oregon office Pre-COVID! Everyone works from home currently.

Who we are:

We are Cram Crew, a one-on-one, in-home tutoring firm. Tutoring firm? Yep, tutoring is what we do, and we‚Äôre dang proud of it. We‚Äôre looking for a superstar Client Representative who will build and manage positive relationships with current and potential clients.

As a member of the Client Representative team, you will be responsible for providing customer service and support to current clients, prospective clients, and our team of academic consultants. You will also perform inside sales while working to streamline administrative and sales processes within our Houston office.

This position is based out of our Houston office. We are looking to hire someone to work part-time with the opportunity to transition to full-time in the future.


What we offer:

‚Ä¢	Hands-on, thorough paid training to provide employee with firm knowledge and understanding of the position and our processes
‚Ä¢	A collaborative and supportive team of colleagues
‚Ä¢	Team-building and social events
‚Ä¢	Professional development

What you‚Äôll be responsible for:

‚Ä¢	Establishing and cultivating current and new client relationships as an account manager
‚Ä¢	Collaborating with team members to create initiatives that will increase client engagement
‚Ä¢	Providing excellent customer service to potential clients while advising them of Cram Crew‚Äôs services and packages, and responding to general inquiries
‚Ä¢	Answering incoming calls and responding to a high volume of email correspondence
‚Ä¢	Implementing strategic initiatives to exceed monthly sales goals

DescriptionExcellent Part-Time Driver Opportunity!!
Position Summary:Penske Truck Leasing seeks highly motivated and qualified applicants to fill the unique position of Hiker (Vehicle Transporter/Truck Driver). This position is responsible for vehicle delivery and returning vehicles to Penske locations and Penske customers. Primarily, this position moves our box trucks up to 26‚Äô and for CDL Class A will include tractors and trailer movement. Position may also provide assistance to the service department to deliver parts and equipment.
This is a casual/on-call part-time truck driving job that is perfect for licensed CDL Class B or CDL Class A drivers seeking supplemental income and looking to work anywhere from 0 to 25 hours a week based on business needs.
Major Responsibilities:‚Ä¢ Follow appropriate safety procedures while driving trucks to destination of Penske location or customer locations‚Ä¢ Check vehicles to ensure that mechanical, safety, and emergency equipment is in good working order, report to location manager if any issues are found‚Ä¢ Obtain receipts or signatures for delivered goods and collect payment for services when required‚Ä¢ Report vehicle defects, accidents, traffic violations, or damage to the vehicles‚Ä¢ Other projects and tasks as assigned by supervisor¬†Hours will vary!
Qualifications:‚Ä¢ 2 years of driving experience required‚Ä¢ 2 years of a clean DMV motor vehicle record required‚Ä¢ CDL Class B license required‚Ä¢ CDL Class A license preferred‚Ä¢ Ability to read and follow written instructions is required.‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently, customer service skills, organizational skills, and a positive attitude are required‚Ä¢ Regular, predictable, full attendance is an essential function of the job‚Ä¢ Willingness to travel as necessary, work the required schedule, work at the specific location required, complete Penske employment application, submit to a background investigation (to include past employment, education, and criminal history) and drug screening are required.
This position is regulated by the Department of Transportation or designated as safety sensitive by the company, and the ability to work in a constant state of alertness and in a safe manner is required. Associates must have the ability to accept responsibility for their own safety, as well as the safety of others.¬†Physical Requirements:-The physical and mental demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an associate to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.-The associate must be able to see and hear. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, peripheral vision, depth perception and the ability to adjust focus.-While performing the duties of this job, the associate will be required to move frequently, stand, walk, and sit. The associate is frequently required to use hands to touch, handle, and feel, and to reach with hands and arms. The associate must be able to regularly lift and/or move up to 50lbs/23kg and occasionally lift and/or move up to 100lbs/45kg.-The associate must be able to legally operate a motor vehicle and safely and frequently enter/exit the vehicle as well as the rear cargo area.
Penske is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
About Penske Truck LeasingPenske Truck Leasing Co., L.P., headquartered in Reading, Pennsylvania, is a partnership of Penske Corporation, Penske Automotive Group and Mitsui & Co., Ltd. A leading global transportation services provider, Penske operates a premier fleet of vehicles and serves its customers from locations in North America, South America, Europe, Australia, and Asia. Penske‚Äôs product lines include full-service truck leasing, contract maintenance, commercial and consumer truck rentals, used truck sales, transportation and warehousing management and supply chain management solutions. Visit www.GoPenske.com to learn more.

QR Code Link to This Post


Job Description

What Are Your Dreams? How Can We Help You Achieve Them?

Men In Kilts is recruiting service technicians and leaders to provide superior customer service and eventually step into a franchise managerial role. Men In Kilts provides window and exterior cleaning services to residential and commercial customers. Our service offerings include window cleaning, gutter cleaning, pressure washing and house washing. We strive to do much of the work from the ground; however, we do use ladders, so being comfortable with heights is a must. And yes, we do wear kilts, which along with dependability, outstanding customer service and flawless execution, defines our brand.

Let‚Äôs Start with You

We hire two types of people at Men In Kilts: Those looking for a career and those looking for a job as a steppingstone to help them along the way to their dream job.

If you are looking for a career, we have an exciting opportunity for leaders who want to grow with us. You will enter our Apprentice Program where we will train you to master the trade as well as how to run your own crew, manage a business and potentially even graduate to franchise ownership.

If you are looking for a stepping stone, we can offer you a position as a window cleaning, gutter cleaning and power washing technician where, over a year or two, you can gain valuable and transferable experience and skills that will equip you to move on to your next career step or life goal.

What Can We Offer - Starting hourly wage with room for growth + Bonus Opportunities

We compensate our technicians through a revenue-sharing model where the harder you work, the more you make, while delivering exceptional service and making people smile. Your drive, work ethic and results will determine how much you make. If you just want to show up and punch a clock, this isn't for you.

More Reasons You Should Want This Job

Freedom and Flexibility ‚Äì You will work independently with no micromanaging. We train and empower you to provide the best possible service to our customers, and we will trust that you will do just that. A positive attitude and friendly personality are what we are looking for. We will teach you the skills.

Satisfaction from Making a Difference and Bringing a Smile to Someone‚Äôs Face - Whether it is delighting a customer with a clean windows, gutters or siding, or just having someone stop you in the street to take your picture, you can feel good about what you do and how you are improving someone else‚Äôs life.

Who Succeeds at Men In Kilts?

We're looking for motivated, goal-oriented individuals who work hard and work smart, to provide an outstanding experience to our customers. Our successful team members also:

- Represent our company with integrity and passion
- Treat our customers like gold
- Safely and efficiently operate our fleet of tartan trucks and maintain our equipment
- Process payments and paperwork (digitally, as we are striving to be a paperless company)
- Engage in a range of business development activities, including distributing marketing materials and participating in the occasional community event
- Thrive working outdoors (rain or shine)
- Have a valid driver‚Äôs license
- Able to lift/carry up to 65 pounds for short periods of time
- Be able to work in temperatures ranging from 25 degrees to 105 degrees
- Are motivated by being part of an exceptional team with shared goals
- Are ready and willing to wear a kilt every day and enjoy the resulting attention!

Men in Kilts is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.

Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


Position: ISA (Inside Sales Asscoiate)
You will be working with a Real Estate team and helping set appointments by calling potential home buyers and home sellers. 

6-8hrs per day
Main responsibilities: Call incoming warm Buyer and Seller leads and set up Zoom appointments for the team.
Can work virtually: 8AM-5PM Mon-Fri
Compensation: Minimum wage first 90 days. Very competitive afterward. Bonuses and commissions included. Ability to earn 60K-100K+ 

Further details: 

This enthusiastic, self-starting person with a passion for selling is responsible for converting leads into appointments through personalized follow-up. 

This individual will take ownership of leads, and actively systematize the conversion process for maximum effectiveness. They can record their productivity and sales metrics and track the results in regular accountability meetings. This person has the drive and tenacity to achieve or exceed productivity, appointment setting, and revenue targets while responding efficiently to customer inquiries (usually in the form of sales leads) and the subsequent documentation, assignment, and follow up on those leads.

This individual must be highly trustworthy‚Äîin addition to being the first point of contact to the team, they will also have access to sensitive files and information regarding associates, customers, and finances.

The Inside Sales Associate's activities directly affect the bottom line, and as such they are deeply committed to the team achieving greater and greater levels of success, as well as to growing their own skills and developing into a leader within the team.

This job will require mental toughness and drive to succeed at a high level! The payout is there for the right person who is driven to achieve, annual compensation ranging from $60K+

Over time, as leadership skills are exhibited, the Inside Sales Associate may have the opportunity to grow into a Sales Manager or Director of Lead Generation.
Other Job Attributes:
compensation: Variable 60K minimum

employment type: full-time

OR MEET THE FOLLOWING 

Instructor Qualification
There are three different methods in which you may qualify for an instructor license:

Method 1 ‚Äì 750 Hours Coursework

Under this method, you must complete 750 hours of vocational coursework in methods of teaching from a licensed private beauty school or a vocational training program in a publicly financed postsecondary institution.

Method 2 ‚Äì 500 Hours Coursework and One Year Experience

Under this method, you must have a combination of vocational coursework and relevant work experience:

Complete 500 hours of instruction in cosmetology in an approved training program, AND

One year of relevant experience:
Operator Instructor License ‚Äì One year of experience as a licensed operator

Specialty Instructor License ‚Äì One year of experience in the specialty applied for

Method 3 ‚Äì College Education

Under this method, you must have a combination of academic coursework and relevant work experience:

You hold a degree in education from an accredited college or university, OR
You have completed 15 semester hours in education courses through an accredited college or university within the 10 years before the date of application

Additionally, you must have one year of verifiable and relevant work experience:

Operator Instructor License ‚Äì One year of experience as a licensed operator

Specialty Instructor License ‚Äì One year of experience in the specialty applied for

Job Title: BILINGUAL (E/S) PHLEBOTOMIST/MA for UPBEAT WELLNESS CLINIC !!
Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


BILINGUAL (E/S) PHLEBOTOMIST/MA for UPBEAT WELLNESS CLINIC !!

compensation: varies based on experience
employment type: full-time or part-time

LOOKING FOR A FUN RESPONSIBLE TEAM PLAYER - Must be GOOD @ all Phlebotomy aspects / MA (certified) (can be Foreign Trained DR/ Graduate) {We are growing and hiring for more than one position ~ must speak, read, type Spanish & English fluently}

Adtl' Job Requirements: Bilingual (Fluent Spanish & English), Reliable Transportation, Flexible, Data Entry/Typing skills, Excellent Customer Service Skills. PREFER EXPERIENCE @ Weight Loss, Men's Health, Cardiologist clinics or Spas.  

We are looking for competent punctual positive Outgoing & Self-motivated people to add to our fun loving team!

Send Resume & Picture: RockingRX @ yahoo  or fax resume to: 832- 426- 7782
~ PLEASE READ & APPLY ONLY IF YOU QUALIFY ~ THX A MILLION! ~

We are looking for a Dependable {Must have reliable transportation}, Bilingual {Spanish & English}, Professional & VERY Outgoing MA/Phlebotomist for a busy and fast growing Weight Loss Center 

Essential duties and responsibilities include the following. Other duties may be assigned. (We cross train everyone so we can support each other!)

Reaching out to potential patients about services and programs provided by clinic.
Sourcing new patients through inbound lead follow-up and outbound calls, texts and emails
Welcomes patients and visitors by greeting them, in person or on the telephone; answering or referring inquiries.
Assist patients with the completion of required paperwork.
Optimizes patients' satisfaction, provider time, and treatment room.
Facilitates patient flow by notifying the provider of patients' arrival, being aware of delays, and communicating with patients and clinical staff.
Responds to patients', prospective patients, and visitor inquiries in a courteous manner.
Manage the flow of patients through the clinic in an organized manner.
Maintain inventory of wellness products, ordering inventory, sorting and reporting. Does include occasional heavy lifting.
"Floater MA" duties as needed
Provides information by answering questions and requests.
Responsible for keeping the area clean and organized.
Protects patient confidentiality.
Maintains operations by following policies and procedures; reporting needed changes.
Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
Function as back-up to other operational/business development team members & Support positive, productive relationships.
Participate in regional networking opportunities and support partner facility events.
Collaborate with leadership on new ideas for positive brand growth.
Able to communicate complex concepts effectively to multiple audiences including other marketers, nurses, physicians, families, and other healthcare providers.
Able to promote positive brand awareness by coordinating with market partners.
Strong analytical, problem solving and organization skills.
Able to work well as team member or independently.

Perform other duties as requested/needed.  We are always polite, respectful & appreciative of our employees. We give tons of low stress training. We always help each other out.

Qualifications and Skills - PLEASE READ

BILINGUAL- Spanish And English Speaking is a MUST
Multi-tasking
Flexibility
Telephone Skills/Sales
Customer Service
Organization
Attention to Detail
Professionalism
Quality Focused
Self-starter with the ability to work with limited supervision
Excellent verbal and written communications skills
Strong time management, organizational and follow up skills required
Must be creative, innovative and have excellent interpersonal skills
Must be enthusiastic and energetic
Knowledge of nutrition advantageous
An organized fast learner that has great people skills
Sales
High school diploma or graduation equivalency degree (GED)
Medical Assistant / phlebotomist Certification 
Prefer 1+ years of experience working in a healthcare environment as MA/Phle, receptionist, marketing and/or sales representative, or the like.

The successful candidate MUST possess required skills and be able to explain and demonstrate, with or without reasonable accommodations, that the essential functions of the job can be performed.

compensation: varies based on experience

employment type: employee's choice

We are currently looking for a Steel Building Detailer & Checker with 5-7 years of experience in steel detailing for building (Pre-Engineered Metal Building detailing experience is a must). This position is responsible for providing a full range of shop drawing for moderate to high complexity Pre-Engineered Metal Building components which includes shop drawings for fabrication of steel members such as built up steel beams & column, Cold Formed C & Z members, Panel system & Trims and Material Lists etc.

Desired Skills:

AutoCAD Experience is a must. Experience with Metal Building Software(MBS) preferred.
Extensive knowledge for AISC steel Manual.
Experience with MS office applications especially Excel.
Experience with detailing various complexity details such as Hip/Valley condition, Mezzanines, Stairs, canopies etc.
Standing Seam roof system detailing.
Ability to interpret architectural drawings and Design Engineer notes to efficiently and accurately prepare detailed drawings.
Use critical problem solving to derive tolerances and other information from specifications.
Ability to meet deadlines on a regular basis while maintaining an acceptable level of quality.
Capable of accurately checking work of other detailers.
Strong Communication and interpersonal skills & Ability to work in a Team Environment.
Establish and maintain effective working relationship with co-workers while demonstrating courteous and professional office etiquette.

QR Code Link to This Post


Job Summary: Performs work outdoors in the yard removing parts from cars.

Essential Job Duties:
1.	Receives labels and work orders from the dispatch office for parts to be pulled.
2.	Pulls, retrieves parts from vehicles in yard.
3.	Inspects parts, verify condition of parts and notifies dispatch office of any damage.
4.	Sorts and stages parts on racks, shelving and bins according to set system.
5.	Operates forklift when needed.
6.	Maintains orderliness & housekeeping of assigned vehicle & work areas.
7.	Complies with established company policies & procedures.
8.	Average 40 hours per week with required overtime.

Job Requirements:
Education And /Or Experience:
‚Ä¢	High school or G.E.D. equivalent desired. 
‚Ä¢	A minimum of 2 years' experience related to automotive mechanical (parts).
Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:
‚Ä¢	Must be safety conscious at all times.
‚Ä¢	Must be able to recognize bin numbered locations.
‚Ä¢	Must be able to work in cooperation with others.
‚Ä¢	Must be able a self-motivated, hard-working and dependable person.
‚Ä¢	Must be attentive to detail and ensure accuracy in work assignments.
‚Ä¢	Must be able to communicate effectively with others.
‚Ä¢	Must have flexibility to work variable schedules which includes Saturdays.
‚Ä¢	Must possess abilities to be adaptable & willing to perform duties beyond normal duties.

Standard Required Tools:
‚Ä¢	3/8" and ¬Ω" Impact tool
‚Ä¢	3/8" and ¬Ω" Metric Impact Sockets
‚Ä¢	Pliers
‚Ä¢	Screwdrivers
‚Ä¢	Ratcheting Wrenches

Work Environment:
While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly exposed to moving mechanical parts. This position is works outdoors in all weather conditions with no coverage and should be able to tolerate high and low temperature levels. 

We Offer:
‚Ä¢	Competitive Pay Rates- Based on experience; ranges from $17.00 to $20.00.
‚Ä¢	401K Plan with generous employer match
‚Ä¢	Insurance Plans for (Medical, Dental, Vision, Life & Disability)
‚Ä¢	Paid Holiday leave (7) days after first 90 day period and Paid Time Off Program after 6 months
‚Ä¢	We are environmentally responsible.
‚Ä¢	Monday - Friday: 6:00 am until completed- Some Saturdays
APPLY AT: https://lkqcorp.jobs.net/en-US/

compensation: Competitive Pay Rates- Based on experience; ranges from $17.00 to $20.00.

Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post





GREAT PAY/BENEFITS, FINANCIALLY SECURE AND FAMILY OWNED COMPANY WHERE EVERYONE GETS TO KNOW YOU--NOT YOUR TRUCK NUMBER



WE OFFER 100% paid for the Employee

Health Insurance
Dental Insurance
Vision Insurance


Year around class A professional driver needed.  We are looking for an individual over the age of 25 with at least 18 months verifiable experience with a clean MVR. No current drug/alcohol violations or felonies.  Mountain and chaining experience are required.  

We are Quality Logistics, LLC.

Work for a debt-free established company in continual operation for 62 years.

We get asked "what's the catch" all the time? There is no catch. Our customer base demands the best service and pays for this service, so we need the best drivers and we pay for the best drivers.

We are expanding and looking for drivers that want a permanent home.
Are you looking to be treated with respect?
Not wanting to work for a huge company where you call in with a number instead of a name?
THERE IS A REASON WHY OUR DRIVER TURN OVER IS SO LOW.
If this interests you, please read on...

A little about us first.
We are a family owned business that was founded in 1959 and we are looking for drivers that want to join our trucking family. We are financially stable; you will not have to worry about your paycheck bouncing. You will talk to a knowledgeable dispatcher on a daily basis that knows who you are down to your favorite football team. If you have any suggestions, we would love to hear about them. In short, we care what you have to say.

Normal runs are out 7 to10 days with most, but not all, resets at home.
Our typical runs are west of the Mississippi with our focus on the Western 11 states.
Assigned trucks, NO SLIP SEATING.
Tractors are I-Shift (you will not have to shift a truck again)



Additional Benefits:

401K plan with company match from day one
Paid on all stops
Cell Phone paid stipend
Birthday gift and Christmas Gift
Vacation and quarterly bonuses
Trucks governed at 70MPH

Position Objective:
The Maintenance Technician provides support and responds to our resident‚Äôs service needs through the direction of the Lead Maintenance Technician. This involves insuring a safe, secure, and comfortable living environment for residents, visitors and staff. The Maintenance Technician must conduct all business in accordance with company policies and procedures including Fair Housing Act, Americans with Disabilities Act, OSHA and all other laws pertaining to apartments.

Key Responsibilities:
Preventative Maintenance/Safety
Must be knowledgeable of pertinent laws and EPA and OSHA regulations governing proper storage and management of hazardous materials, including solvents, flammables, caustics and Freon.
Performs maintenance as scheduled by the Lead Maintenance Technician
Constantly be aware of the condition of apartment property throughout the community and report any maintenance concerns on vacant units, models, and common areas, to the Lead Maintenance Technician; e.g., broken gates leading to the pool, broken steps, open holes, broken/burned out exterior lights.
Performs routine preventive maintenance on all appropriate equipment as directed by Lead Maintenance Technician. Inspects and maintains all tools in excellent condition.
Be aware of all utility meter cut-offs, apartment and fixture cut-offs, sewer cleanouts.
Performs work area clean-up and safety related duties.
Ensures that storage areas always remain locked when not in use.

General:
Performs minor and routine maintenance/repair, as directed by the Lead
Training Skills/Knowledge or experience:
Training, Skills, Knowledge and/or Experience:
1-3 years of property maintenance experience in a residential environment
High degree of professionalism
Equipment Requirement:
Required to wear back support belt, wear goggles when working with specific equipment, wear masks and gloves and other safety equipment as tasks dictate.
Equipment/Machinery/Tools:
An employee in this position must be knowledgeable and skilled in the safe use and maintenance of the following tools:
o Hand Tools: Various wrenches, hammers, grips, saws, sledgehammers, snips, posthole diggers, etc.
o Power Tools: Wrenches, grinders, sanders, drills, saws, etc.
o User-Moved Aids: Wheelbarrows, dollies, hand trucks, buckets, hoists, jacks, step ladders, full
o ladders, double ladders.
o Mechanical Equipment: Motors, pumps, compressors, blowers, electric and hand power augers, etc.
o Measuring Devices: Calipers, voltmeters, ohmmeters, testing meters, PH tests, gauges, etc.
Physical requirements:
Constant need (66% to 100% of the time) to be on feet.
Have constant need (66% to 100% of the time) to perform the following physical activities:
o Bend/Stoop/Squat/Kneel Perform routine maintenance/repairs, pick up tools and needed equipment.
o Climb Stairs Service requests, make-ready needs for 2nd and 3rd floor apartments.
o Push or Pull Move equipment, appliances, open and close doors, etc.
o Reach Above Shoulder Perform routine maintenance/repairs, stock and remove equipment, parts, etc.
o Climb Ladders Perform routine maintenance/repairs.
o Grasp/Grip/Turning Handle tools and equipment, perform routine maintenance/repairs.
o Finger Dexterity Handle tools and equipment, perform routine maintenance/repairs.

o Writing: Inventory maintenance, requisition requests, required maintenance reports.

Job Title: Foreign Currency Trader - Finance, Part Time, Remote - Work From Home
Job Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


Top-ranked proprietary trading firm, Maverick Trading, is searching for entrepreneurially-minded, profit-driven people to be trained in the art and science of proprietary trading in its online foreign exchange trading division, Maverick FX.  Successful candidates will trade foreign currencies with the firm's capital on behalf of the firm and reap the majority share of the profits.

As one of the best proprietary Forex trading firms in the industry, Maverick FX offers its traders impressive capital and leverage, comprehensive training, and extensive support and mentoring.  We teach our traders how to trade in the Forex market.  Maverick FX's capital base, training, and reputation has allowed us to partner with the top currency trading broker to offer our traders tighter spreads and better execution than the typical retail Forex firm.

The Forex market is open 23-1/2 hours a day, five days a week.  This time horizon allows the firm to offer its traders flexible hours and the ability to start part-time and transition into full-time trading.  Prop forex trading is a mentally engaging, challenging profession where diligence and consistency translate directly into financial reward.  In other words, this is truly meaningful work.  The firm's traders have the opportunity to practice their craft from anywhere in the world via high-speed internet.

---About Maverick Trading FX Division---

Started in 1997, Maverick Trading is one of the most experienced prop trading firms and is ranked as one of the top trading companies in the industry, accepting and funding experienced traders as well as teaching motivated people from all backgrounds how to become traders.  The firm's Maverick FX Division has been actively trading the Forex markets since 2009.  As a result of a long track record of success, the firm has the capital to back and fund its traders with meaningful amounts of capital.

Each trader starts live trading with a minimum of a $10,000 account ($500,000 in buying power) and keeps 70% to 80% of trading profits.  As you gain experience and demonstrate consistent profitability you become eligible for greater amounts of the firm's capital.  Our top traders can trade up to $300,000 ($15 million in buying power).  Profitable traders are also eligible for Performance Bonuses.

---How to Apply---

Our application process is multi-step and designed to educate you on prop trading, how we train, support and fund our traders, and how we pay out profits to you, as well as focus you for your interview where you can have any remaining questions answered and discuss with your recruiter why Maverick FX is a good fit for you.
To get started, click on the application link below.  This will take you to a short video that will discuss Maverick FX and its Capital Sharing Program (how you get funded and paid).

When you complete the application process, you will be contacted by one of our experienced recruiters (who are also traders themselves) for a Suitability Interview.

CLICK on the link below to begin the application process:

https://maverickfx.com/maverick-trading/apply/fx-division/?utm_source=clwedhouston

If you're interested in trading the markets at a professional level, whether part-time, full-time, or in a transitional or supplementary income capacity, it pays to start with one of the best prop trading firms in the industry.  

We look forward to speaking with you and exploring if you'll be the next great trader to join us.

Cheers,

The Maverick FX Team

QR Code Link to This Post


Job Summary

The Irrigation Technician is responsible for working as a team member under the direct supervision of the Operations Manager or Irrigation Manager. The Irrigation Technician is responsible for executing irrigation inspection systems; in an efficient manner, promote worksite safety, providing excellent customer service, and exhibit pride and quality workmanship.

Job Requirements:

Must be able to work a 5-day schedule, may include weekends and holidays.
Must be able to show proof of legal authorization to work in the United States.
Highly motivated, self-driven, and detailed oriented.
Must be professional in appearance and actions.
Maintain good attendance record as well as good punctuality.
Understands and adheres to company/safety policies, proper lifting techniques, and heat stress.
Must be able to properly, efficiently, and safely work with irrigation hand tools, and gas powered equipment.
Must be able to identify watering needs of commonly used plants, trees and turf in the Austin area.
Knowledge of two-wire systems strongly preferred.
TX Landscape Irrigator or Irrigation Technicians License strongly preferred not required.
If driving for the company, must have and maintain a valid state issued driver‚Äôs license as well as clear driving record.
Duties and Responsibilities:

Attend training and safety meetings and apply the subject matter to day to day task.
Follow directions given by Account Manager.
Work as part of a team.
Always represent the company‚Äôs best interest, maintain the highest level of integrity and professionalism.
Identify, correct or report work hazards on job sites.
Must be able to safely inspect, perform preventative maintenance on small engine power equipment.
Execute lock out / tag out procedures on small equipment.
Properly excavate, back fill and compact trenches.
Cut and glue PVC pipe and fittings.
Run and connect irrigation wire.
Safely load and secure pipe and irrigation parts for transport in work vehicle.
Program, trouble shoot, repair, trace wires, on existing and new irrigation controllers and systems for commercial and residential accounts.
Repair drip hose and fittings, adjust nozzles and spray patterns on different types of sprinkler heads.
Maintain detailed records of irrigation maintenance activities, completed work orders, inventory and time sheets.
Manage budgeted man hours per job.
Communicate equipment, labor, material requests, and follow direction given by Account Manager.
Communicate and coordinate work with other trades on site.
Assist with accident and incident reports.
Identify utility line locations at job sites before digging
Perform other duties as assigned.
Benefits

Competitive salary based on experience with merit increases for exceptional job performance
401K
Commission available for any out of contract sales
Benefits package available (Health Insurance, Dental and Vision, and more)
Paid holidays
Paid vacation

compensation: $17-$18 per hour - DOE
